comment: Claude Code MCP Configuration Examples for Apple Docs
comment2: Choose ONE of these configurations based on your setup

public_server.description: Use the public server at mcp.xdocs.dev (API key required)

self_hosted.description: Connect to your own self-hosted server

local_development.description: For local development - run MCP server directly

usage_instructions.step1: Get your API key at https://xdocs.dev
usage_instructions.step2: Choose public_server, self_hosted, or local_development based on your needs
usage_instructions.step3: Copy the 'config' content to your Claude Code MCP settings
usage_instructions.step4: Replace 'your-api-key-here' with your actual API key
usage_instructions.step5: Restart Claude to apply the configuration
